Package Models

Class ChatModel

java.lang.Object
Models.ModelBase
Models.ChatModel
public class ChatModel extends ModelBase
The ChatModel class provides functionality for managing chat-related operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatModel

      public ChatModel(String username, Socket socket)
      Constructs a new instance of ChatModel with the specified username and socket.
      Parameters:
      username - The username associated with the chat model.
      socket - The socket used for communication with the server.

  • Method Details

    • subscribe

      public void subscribe(INotifyPropertyChanged listener)
      Subscribes an INotifyPropertyChanged listener to receive notifications about property changes. Initializes the chat by sending an initial message and starting the message listening thread.
      Overrides:
      subscribe in class ModelBase
      Parameters:
      listener - The INotifyPropertyChanged listener to be subscribed.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(MessageRecord message)
      Sends a message to the server and notifies subscribers about the result.
      Parameters:
      message - The MessageRecord to be sent.

    • listenForMessage

      public void listenForMessage()
      Listens for incoming messages from the server in a separate thread.

    • closeEverything

      public void closeEverything(Socket socket, ObjectInputStream ois, ObjectOutputStream oos)
      Closes the socket, ObjectInputStream, and ObjectOutputStream.
      Parameters:
      socket - The socket to be closed.
      ois - The ObjectInputStream to be closed.
      oos - The ObjectOutputStream to be closed.
